00038 #ifndef _LUSTRE_RSYNC_H_
00039 #define _LUSTRE_RSYNC_H_
00040 
00041 #define LR_NAME_MAXLEN 64
00042 #define LR_FID_STR_LEN 128
00043 
00044 /* Structure used by lustre_rsync. On-disk structures stored in a log
00045  * file. This is used to determine the next start record and other
00046  * parameters. */
00047 
00048 struct lustre_rsync_status {
00049         __u32   ls_version;           /* Version of the log entry */
00050         __u32   ls_size;              /* Size of the log entry */
00051         __u64   ls_last_recno;        /* Last replicated record no. */
00052         char    ls_registration[LR_NAME_MAXLEN + 1]; /* Changelog registration*/
00053         char    ls_mdt_device[LR_NAME_MAXLEN + 1]; /* MDT device */
00054         char    ls_source_fs[LR_NAME_MAXLEN + 1]; /* Source Lustre FS */
00055         char    ls_source[PATH_MAX + 1];/* Source FS path */
00056         __u32   ls_num_targets;       /* No of replication targets */
00057         char    ls_targets[0][PATH_MAX + 1]; /* Target FS path */
00058 };
00059 
00060 struct lr_parent_child_log {
00061         char pcl_pfid[LR_FID_STR_LEN];
00062         char pcl_tfid[LR_FID_STR_LEN];
00063         char pcl_name[PATH_MAX];
00064 };
00065 
00066 #endif /* _LUSTRE_RSYNC_H_ */
